channel.title: Object to open shop?
channel.description:
Hey,
Is is possible to make an object open up a shop menu? I've made a case for the object, i made it so that when u click it you get 1gp because im makin it a wardrobe selling stiff at 0gp ea.. and u need 1gp to pay 0gp. so im just wondering if u could maybe give me a tut on this post or give me a link to an already made tut?
:)thanks!

item.title: Object to open shop?
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

YES THANK-YOU I GOT IT!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Object to open shop?
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Try this:

if(atObject == [objectid]) { openUpShop(shopid); }
See if that works

Read full topic

item.title: Object to open shop?
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

if(objectID == [objectid] && objectX == [objectx] && objectY == [objecty]){ if(misc.random2(50) >=3){ openUpShop(shop id); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Object to open shop?
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

No, no. You add the TOP one UNDER the bottom one.

Read full topic

item.title: Object to open shop?
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

kool but whats the

teleportToX = 3213; teleportToY = 3467;
there for?

when i log in, it stays black screen the says connection lost…

Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)

Read full topic

item.title: Object to open shop?
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

Add:

case OBJECTID: WanneShop = SHOPID; break;
Under

case 13670: teleportToX = 3213; teleportToY = 3467; pEmote = 3363; break;
ObjectId, is the Id of the object xD and the SHOPID is the Shop Number (Go into shops.cfg and you will see the shop number)

Read full topic
